title: Audit Environmental Compliance
description: For a manufacturing company, an auditor reviews compliance with environmental regulations.

tasks.description: Review the company's environmental permits to understand the requirements for air and water emissions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor understands the specific compliance requirements.

tasks.description: Review the emission monitoring reports that have been submitted to the environmental agency.
tasks.expected_outcome: Auditor has the submitted compliance reports.

tasks.description: Compare the reported emissions to the permit limits and find that on two occasions, the limit for a specific chemical was exceeded.
